text: Busto Arsizio (; Lombard: BÃ¼sti Grandi) is a city in northern Italy. Busto Arsizio is in the Lombardy Region. 83,405 people live there. It is north of Milan. The economy of Busto Arsizio is based on industry and commerce. Pro Patria Calcio football club plays in Busto Arsizio. Category:Cities in Varese
title: Busto Arsizio
